1370: Claward moved to Muurhuysen1.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Waldrada at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Waldrada, Claward, at age 19.
1372: Had a son with Waldrada, Cees, at age 21.
1374: Had a son with Waldrada, Voghel, at age 23.
1376: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Siwa, at age 25.
1379: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Sophia, at age 28.
1382: Lost daughter Sophia when Sophia was 4 years old.
1384: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Eingeliadis, at age 33.
1388: Had a son with Waldrada, Eghenonis, at age 37.
